ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a nice Rough Ash Recurve Bow that dishes out 17 dmg with standard arrow. Cost 34 p though, so probably stick with the elm until your skill is 80 + I
ygData.messageBody:
I have a nice Rough Ash Recurve Bow that dishes out 17 dmg with standard arrow.
Cost 34 p though, so probably stick with the elm until your skill is 80 +

I heard a rumour of fletching parts that can be bought in HH but have yet to
find them. You can always get a friend to buy them for you.

I wouldn't not recommend using archeryy full on until level 9 or more. Then grab
one of those needle thingy's which are like daggers but use the archery skill.
they are the best way to raise your skill since they use no arrows, so are much
cheaper. Don't do much damage but good for practicing.

Also, arcehry is good with either SoW or clinging darkness for kiting. I kited a
Bull Elepahnt that conned yellow to half health without taking a hit before
closing in and fighting it.

With Arcehry kiting and pets, Yellows are easily soloed by SK, even up to lvl 20

Inos
Veeshan


Jeremy Pollack wrote:

> From: "Jeremy Pollack" <jpollack@...>
>
> Just my experiences with archery.
>
> I have a Rough Elm Recurve Bow which has a base 13 damage. With the 1 dmg
> arrows, I can do 14 damage to beasties. I also have an 80 skill in Archery,
> having practiced and practices (and practiced and practiced) till my thumbs
> bleed. Now that I have a good skill and a good bow, I find it quite
> worthwhile. But I would not reccomend it for anyone that is shy on spending
> a LOT of time working on getting it up (I probably fired 3,000+ arrows in my
> training). My bow does almost as much damage as a mino axe, although it is
> slower (48 I think maybe 51, compared to 38 for mino axe).
>
> As for fletching ... there is nowhere on Antonica to get fletching supplies
> except surefall glade. The only other plalce I know to get bowyering
> supplies is in Oggok which is not an option for humans (DE, Trolls and Ogres
> only). Even ones that worship Innoruuk. :(
>
